remarks:
Inference that swaps (commutes) antecedents in an implication. Inference associated with ~ pm2.04 .  Its associated inference is ~ mpi .  (Contributed by NM, 29-Dec-1992.)  (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 4-Aug-2012.)
